artist: Artist: Michael Mazur; Author: Dante Alighieri; Translator: Robert Pinsky; Publisher: Published by the artist and Mary Ryan Gallery, New York; Designer: Book and portfolio designed by Anne Beresford; Printer: Michael Mazur; Printer: Robert Townsend
description: 41 etchings with letterpress text in English and Italian; housed in two portfolios in a clamshell box

title: L'Inferno di Dante (The Inferno of Dante)
